curam.util.resources
Interface EnvironmentConstants.XMLServer

Enclosing interface:
EnvironmentConstants
public static interface EnvironmentConstants.XMLServer

These settings configure the environment in which the XML Server will be used.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String kEnvServerFileEncoding
          The encoding that should be used for the encoding of files provided to the XMLServer.
static java.lang.String kEnvServerHost
          The host on which the XML Print Server resides.
static java.lang.String kEnvServerPort
          The port on which the XML Print Server is listening.
static java.lang.String kEnvServerPrinter
          The printer name that will be provided to the XML Server.
static java.lang.String kEnvServerSerializeLocaleNeutral
          Specify that xml server data will be serialized in a locale-neutral way instead of being based on the locale properties on the server.
static java.lang.String kEnvServerTray
          The printer tray that will be provided to the XML Server.
static java.lang.String kXMLServerClientSocketTimeout
          The XMLServer client socket timeout.
 

Field Detail

kEnvServerHost

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerHost
The host on which the XML Print Server resides. The property may also be specified as a '/' separated list of host names in order to use multiple XML Servers. For further information please refer to the Curam XML Infrastructure Guide. Property name : curam.xmlserver.host

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnvServerPort

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerPort
The port on which the XML Print Server is listening. The property may also be specified as a '/' separated list of ports in order to use multiple XML Servers. For further information please refer to the Curam XML Infrastructure Guide. Property name : curam.xmlserver.port

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnvServerPrinter

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerPrinter
The printer name that will be provided to the XML Server. Property name : curam.xmlserver.printer

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnvServerTray

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerTray
The printer tray that will be provided to the XML Server. Property name : curam.xmlserver.tray

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnvServerFileEncoding

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerFileEncoding
The encoding that should be used for the encoding of files provided to the XMLServer. Property name : curam.xmlserver.fileencoding

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kEnvServerSerializeLocaleNeutral

static final java.lang.String kEnvServerSerializeLocaleNeutral
Specify that xml server data will be serialized in a locale-neutral way instead of being based on the locale properties on the server. Property name : curam.xmlserver.serializelocaleneutral

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kXMLServerClientSocketTimeout

static final java.lang.String kXMLServerClientSocketTimeout
The XMLServer client socket timeout. Property name : curam.xmlserver.client.sotimeout
